thread.section_title: Its4women Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Its4women | www.its4women.ie
thread.title: Gráinne McInerney

author: Gráinne McInerney
title: Gráinne McInerney
text: Excellent service on the phone with very very friendly staff. My only problem was I couldn't change my car online as your system couldn't recognise the registration of my new car, which didn't occur when I rang you, so I was subject to the €10 charge. I don't mind paying in this case as the service is very good on the phone but I just don't know why your system couldn't recognise the car online. Other than that 5 stars!!!! Thanks.
